adobeMarket.estado: View the Status of My Rewards
adobeMarket.noDP: You do not have enough DigiPoints to redeem the number of gift cards added.
adobeMarket.felicitaciones: Congratulations on the rewards you've earned with your DigiPoints!
adobeMarket.descFelicitaciones: Your gift cards have been successfully processed. Remember that you can check the status of your rewards once they have been approved.
adobeMarket.gana: Earn and redeem your DigiPoints for wonderful rewards!
adobeMarket.visaDescription: With the rechargeable Visa digital card, you can make online purchases (e-commerce), allow international use, transfer between OnlyPay cards or bank accounts, pay bills, and top up your cell phone. Once your reward request is audited and approved, you will receive an email to complete the registration process and unlock your Virtual Card, so you can check the card balance and account statement, and expiration date, which is 24 months. The card will be loaded in local currency and the value will depend on the dollar exchange rate variation on the date of request. For more information, please review the program's Terms and Conditions.
adobeMarket.masterCardDescription: You will receive an email with a virtual code. You only have 90 DAYS to activate it. You must go to https://www.myprepaidcenter.com/redeem and create a profile. Once this process is completed, you will be assigned a 16-digit virtual Mastercard debit card, with its respective verification code. With this card, you can only make online purchases. Don't forget to add the card to your profile. This way, you can check details like the balance and expiration date of your reward, which is 6 MONTHS.
adobeMarket.cencosudDescription: With the rechargeable Cenconsud digital card, you can shop at Jumbo, Paris, Paris.cl, Easy, and Santa Isabel stores throughout Chile. Once your reward request is approved and audited, you will receive an email, which you can print or show from your cellphone at the time of purchase. This Gift Card has a validity of 12 Months for use and is regulatory, meaning it can only be used by the account holder. Not valid for use on Easy.cl and Jumbo.cl. To check your balance, go to www.giftcard.cl, with the card number and password printed on the coupon. For more information, please review the program's T&C.
adobeMarket.rappiDescription: Use your DigiPoints to redeem them for Rappi Credits, allowing you to shop in one of the largest Marketplace in the country. To do this, you will need to download the Rappi APP on your cellphone or go to www.rappi.com.co and register; after redeeming, you will receive an email with a code. The next step is: 1. Open the Rappi app. 2. Touch your profile icon located in the upper left corner. 3. Select the Coupons item. 4. Enter the Code sent to your email. 5. Select Validate. Rappi Credits will be automatically added to your account. Remember that one (1) Rappi Credit corresponds to $1 COP and the dollar to Colombian peso exchange will be made with the Representative Market Rate (TRM). For more information, please review the program's T&C corresponding to this incentive.
adobeMarket.falabellaDescription: The GIFT CARD Falabella is a virtual card that will arrive at your business email and you can redeem it at Falabella stores or on www.falabella.com.co. For physical stores, you don't need to have the card printed; you can present it from your cellphone or digital medium. Remember that the validity of the card is 12 months from its issuance. To redeem it through Falabella.com: when choosing the payment method, select pay with Gift Card or Wedding Card; enter the card number that contains 16 numeric digits and enter the alphanumeric security code that contains 8 digits. You cannot complete the purchase with other payment methods. For more information, please review the program's T&C corresponding to this incentive.
adobeMarket.visaBancolombiaDescription: With the Visa incentives card, you can make withdrawals at Bancolombia ATMs, other banks, and international ATMs. Additionally, you can make purchases at physical and electronic establishments, including online shopping. Also, you can check the available balance at any time and there is no reissue cost in case of loss or theft. The card has a validity of 5 years and works like a credit card for online purchases. Once you request it through our platform, it will be sent to the main office address and should arrive within 8 to 13 business days. In summary, the incentives card offers a wide range of options and ease of use. For more information, please review the program's T&C corresponding to this incentive.

htw.copyCanal:
Align with the priorities of FY23 and accumulate more DigiPoints by Migrating, Renewing, and Selling through the Marketplace.
Now all sales of Creative Cloud and Document Cloud, both in renewals and new business, earn equally in the Marketplace.
Your opportunity to WIN more is today, combining the best strategies for renewal, retention, and growth.

See the full DigiPoints allocation table:
htw.copyDist:
Get motivated to meet the FY23 goals and accumulate more DigiPoints by supporting the management of your Gold channels, with all sales of participating Adobe brand products. During this new period, you will accumulate points as follows: Earn 10 DigiPoints for every $1,000 USD FOB, in sales of GOLD channel of any participating product license, with Renewals and New Business.

See the full DigiPoints allocation table:
